Text:
Hi ClaudiaZ. 
I have a special request; could you please upload next Wednesday's classic Sam and Jason episode. Jason's brain tumour was when we lost GH on cable here in Australia and it was also the height of old JaSam before all the bad stuff happened. I would love to see it.
Extra special thanks as always,
SamsStar

Hi honey,

I'll try to catch that episode next week for you. Glad to know about you again!!
